Trade/Device Name(s): FORA GTel Blood Glucose Monitoring System
FORA GTel Blood Glucose Test Strip
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA GTel Blood Glucose Monitoring System using amperometric biosensor technology for glucose quantification in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger, intended for home monitoring by people with diabetes mellitus, not for diagnosis, screening, use on neonates, or multi-person use
